img.alt: Back to School Vaccine Info for 12th Grade

div.div: A Meningitis booster dose is required for individuals entering the 12th grade or by 17 years of age, whichever comes first.

Notice:¬† The Davidson County School District websites www.davidson.k12.nc.us are in the process of being updated to ensure compliance with Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act and Title II of the Americans with Disabilities Act.¬† In the interim, any website accessibility concerns may be addressed by contacting: The DCS Communication Department at 336.242.5548 or communicationdept@davidson.k12.nc.us
